features: Lite-Show™ technology improves visibility in low light conditions
Rearfoot and forefoot GEL® technology cushioning provides excellent shock absorption
Ortholite™ sockliner provides soft step-in comfort
Sockliner is produced with a solution dyeing process that reduces water usage by 33% and carbon emissions by approx. 45%
At least 20% of the primary material of the shoe's upper is made with recycled materials to reduce waste and carbon emissions
